confirmdialog.title: ConfirmDialog
confirmdialog.subtitle: Modal confirmation dialog component for requesting user action confirmation with preset types and customization

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Standard confirmation dialog with message, title and "Yes" and "No" buttons. Controlled via `show` property

type.title: Dialog Types
type.description: Dialog supports four preset types via `type` property: `warning` (warning), `success` (success), `error` (error), `info` (info). Each type has its own icon and style

template.title: Custom Template
template.description: Using `header` slot for custom header, `default` slot for custom content and `actions` slot for custom action buttons. `header` slot receives `close` parameter (close), `actions` slot receives `confirm` (confirm) and `cancel` (cancel) parameters

oneAction.title: Single Button Dialog
oneAction.description: Dialog can be displayed with only one action button. Use `showCancel: false` to show only confirm button or `showConfirm: false` to show only cancel button. Useful for informational messages or mandatory confirmations

argTypes.message: Confirmation message text displayed in dialog
argTypes.type: Dialog type, determining preset icon and style: warning, success, error, info
argTypes.icon: Vue component icon displayed next to message (has priority over type)
argTypes.iconColor: Icon color (CSS color in any format)
argTypes.confirmSeverity: Confirm button color palette: primary, secondary, contrast
argTypes.cancelSeverity: Cancel button color palette: primary, secondary, contrast
argTypes.confirmVariant: Confirm button style variant: filled, outlined, text
argTypes.cancelVariant: Cancel button style variant: filled, outlined, text
argTypes.closeOnConfirm: Automatically close dialog when confirm button is clicked
argTypes.closeOnCancel: Automatically close dialog when cancel button is clicked
argTypes.width: Dialog width in pixels (number) or string with units
argTypes.maxHeight: Maximum dialog height (number in pixels or string with units, e.g. "90vh")
argTypes.maxWidth: Maximum dialog width (number in pixels or string with units, e.g. "90vw")
argTypes.modal: Makes dialog modal (with darkened background, blocking interaction with rest of content)
argTypes.closeOnOverlayClick: Close dialog when clicking on darkened background (overlay)
argTypes.closeOnEscape: Close dialog when pressing Escape key
argTypes.lockScroll: Lock page scrolling when dialog is open
argTypes.teleportTo: Selector or element to which dialog is teleported (default "body", false - no teleport)
argTypes.zIndex: Z-index for dialog (used to control stacking order)
argTypes.title: Dialog title displayed in header (if header slot is not used)
argTypes.durationEnter: Duration of appearance animation in milliseconds
argTypes.durationLeave: Duration of disappearance animation in milliseconds
argTypes.animation: Type of appearance/disappearance animation: fade (fade), zoom (scaling), slide (slide)
argTypes.closeIcon: Vue component icon for close button (if not specified, default icon is used)
argTypes.header: Slot for custom header. Receives parameter: close (close)
argTypes.default: Slot for custom dialog content (instead of message)
argTypes.actions: Slot for custom action buttons. Receives parameters: confirm (confirm function), cancel (cancel function)
argTypes.confirm: Event fired when confirm button is clicked
argTypes.cancel: Event fired when cancel button is clicked
argTypes.show: Event fired when dialog is shown
argTypes.hide: Event fired when dialog is hidden
argTypes.overlayClick: Event fired when clicking on darkened background (overlay)
argTypes.escape: Event fired when Escape key is pressed
